entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext should allow context composition #80527
  • `InvalidCastException`s on generic types from different ALCs can be unhelpful. #80526
  • Unity 2022.2.1f1 - System.Text.Json "no viable overloaded '='" #80525
  • Documentation Comments for IMultiplyOperators`3 mention division. #80521
  • Different behavior after refactoring to `ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull()` #80516
  • [API Proposal]: Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #80508
  • ILLink analyzer tests - improve ref assembly acquisition #80504
  • StripSymbols doesn't seem to work on 7.0.102 arm64 Raspbian OS #80499
  • JIT: Block morph can avoid creating stores for dead fields #80498
    Future
  • JIT: More cases for last-use copy elision #80494
    8.0.0
  • POST requests on ARM64 hang until timeout #80491
  • Client Certificate does not work on .NET 6.0 on MacOS #80490
  • [6.0] CI failure in OSX: Unable to load shared library 'MovedNativeLib' in DllImportPathTest.sh #80476
  • [6.0] CI failure: UnauthorizedAccessException in System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #80475

Closed

  • Array might not be zero-initialized #79882
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 7] OptionsConfigurationServiceCollectionExtensions.Configure regression #80062
    7.0.x
  • Generated content without usage #80514
  • Non-default property setter in class bound with appsettings.json, no longer loading in .NET 7 #79848
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Vectorized BitArray.IsAnyBitSet #80518
  • Undue restrictions on adding types with System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.MetadataBuilder #80360
    Future
  • Breaking change with DateTime #79956
  • JIT: Incorrect last use propagation for implicit byrefs when undoing promotion #80488
    8.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3285 with interpreter #54396
    8.0.0
  • Massive allocations of Func<Type, JsonTypeInfo> in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions+CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo(Type) #80430
    8.0.0
  • Cannot parte RFC1123 dates #80156
  • TimeSpan - Microseconds and Nanoseconds #79333
    Future
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById() doesn't always return correct UTC time offset #79860
  • X509ChainTrustMode.CustomRootTrust behaves different on Linux (fails chain validation with PartialChain) #80483
  • System.Text.Json TryGetDateTimeOffset String=\u007F\u007F Error=Index was outside the bounds of the array. #80383
  • Error from RuntimeMethodInfo.GetGenericMethodDefinition() - InvalidOperation #80486
  • Solution for FTP with HttpClient? #80473
  • What does the `License notice for Algorithm from Internet Draft document "UUIDs and GUIDs"` apply to? #79231
  • [API Proposal]: make it easier to create custom Stream, TextReader, and TextWriter implementations #64958
    Future
  • [LSG] LoggerMessage source generator generates error when using template destructuring #69490
    8.0.0
  • [LSG] Logging Source Generator fails to detect event name uniqueness within a class scope #64667
    8.0.0
  • IEEE754 approximation even on very simple calculation #80500
  • Issue with Razor (Crashed After errors!) #80496
  • [6.0] .NET 4.8 queue removed #79858
  • Expired Helix queue windows.10.amd64.client21h1.open failing 6.0 CI run #79646
  • Quic listen internal error #78573
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_File #78405
  • [RyuJIT] Eliminate unecessary copies when passing structs #9839
    Future
  • JIT Optimization: Merge multiple `inc` into one `add` #65025
    Future
  • Codegen difference: Local vs IL Stack #75206
    Future
  • JIT: Improve last-use copy omission for implicit byrefs #76069
    8.0.0
  • The createdump tool creates double crash dumps when running in a Linux container on Kubernetes #78956
    8.0.0
  • .NET Native AOT warnings from System.Net.Http #78367
    7.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] 230 kB size regression in Hello World from Enum changes #79437
  • SA #80477
  • HttpClient exceptions are always culture specific #80424

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce TieredPGO_InstrumentedTierAlwaysOptimized for PGO tests #80524
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove two string.Replace calls from CreditCardAttribute.IsValid #80523
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Disable `ExposedLocalsNumbering` #80522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement more jiterpreter opcodes #80520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove per-context delegate allocations in netcoreapp targets #80517
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix delegate allocation in CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo #80513
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Disable GetProviderNames_AssertProperties test #80512
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Ensure the right TFM is referenced in STJ sourcegen tests. #80509
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [browser] make default initial memory size 16MB #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2085846 #80505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80503
    area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80502
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #80497
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Conditional disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [eventpipe] Support arrays of primitive types as struct members #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress warnings for taking address of TypedReference #80484
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Use weak handle for the back reference to EventProvider #80482
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable edge based profiles for all scenarios #80481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix security transparency issue #80478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric

Merged

  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Consistently use fgMakeMultiUse in the gtNewSimd*Node APIs #80242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lowercase TargetOS #80164
  • JIT: Fix invalid last use propagation for implicit byrefs #80489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Change github illink links #80407
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] Don't upgrade homebrew packages in CI #80455
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [workloads] Specify arm64 alias instead of arm in the arm64 pack #80434
  • [release/7.0] Crash when region survives >2GB #80392
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Fix delegate allocation in CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo #80437
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Backport FileStream finalization fixes #80439
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.14
  • remove draft IETF license section superseded by RFC 4122 #80506
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds diagnostics to detect duplicated event names in LSG #80460
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Fix duplicate asset because of "Build tools subset to generate artifacts" #80487
    linkable-framework
  • WASI gc - fix stack range #80456
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove some temp string allocations from Uri #80469
    area-System.Net
  • Remove some split/substring/trim allocations from System.Net.* #80471
    area-System.Net
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove Drawing.Common .NETCoreApp PNSEs #80435
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix multiple dumps from being generated #80474
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't upgrade homebrew packages in CI #80454
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fixing compressed singlefile scenario on osx-arm64 #80283
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 7.0.3
  • Jiterpreter opcode updates + implement safepoints #80479
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80321
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] fix for generation info in GCMemoryInfo #80417
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.14
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #80452
    area-Serialization
  • Feature/logging messagetemplate compat #80364
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80438
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Move a regression test out of CI #80399
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.3
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Simplify the dedup code. #80442
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #80433
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - ARM64/X64 - Optimize 'x & -1' to a cast #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80121
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80312
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Fix path to `ping` on Android API 21-27 #80120
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, os-android
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix small buffer handling with the Platform Crypto Provider #80457
    area-System.Security
  • Fix NetFramework name in Directory.Build.targets #80440
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix timeout in regex source generated test #80459
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Fixed getting namespace names of array types. #80426
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80432
    area-System.IO
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use CompressionLevel.SmallestSize in Bundler #80372
    area-HostModel
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Have SIMD Load/Store use GT_IND and GT_ASG where possible #80411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Get entry assembly name from host for GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #80301
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Runtime tests generate a significant number of warnings #2165

Closed

  • How to store binary resources when reflection is off? #2152
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: LLVM version upgrade to v15 and opaque pointers #2138

PullRequests

Created

  • Patch a GC hole with SDSUs in the IL backend #2164

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Stop Github notifications #2162

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable inclusion of IIS hosting assets (ANCM & web.config) in publish output when PublishNativeAot=true #29896
  • .NET 7.0: Arm64 Docker build fails with NullReferenceException for TargetOutputs on restore step #29892
  • Azure Functions Dotnet (Isolated) for .NET 7.0 #29884

Closed

  • `dotnet restore` does not work behind a proxy #29876
  • Suspicious code found inside the ResolvePackageAssets task #16447
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet format fails to locate msbuild #27332
  • dotnet-watch tool missing in SDK #29609
    8.0.1xx
  • .NET 6 SDK latest version endpoint returns incorrect version #29878

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29895
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29894
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29886
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable single-file tests #29872
    Area-SingleFile

Merged

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #29855
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Added test for new naming behavior of PreferDefaultName property #29871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include dotnet-watch redist output in layouts #29611
    Area-Infrastructure
  • createdinomagi #29496
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #29862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #29858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29853
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29746
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.3
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Make generated `Program` for top-level statements public by default #6769

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider optimizing constrained calls to base methods on readonly struct in some cases #66365
  • Ensure we validate features against older SDKs #66361
    17.6 P3

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33311.152 #66362
  • IBCMerge error for EditorFeatures.Wpf in signed build #57863
    17.3
  • Bad code generation -- needless and unavoidable allocation #66314
  • Honor Microsoft.FSharp.Core.AutoOpenAttribute in C# #66321
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33310.323 #66352

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporarily stop merging in main-vs-deps #66366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66364
    Area-Compilers
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Improve our testing of DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66356
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle compiler diagnostics reported in .cshtml files during build #66355
    Area-IDE, area-web-frameworks
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after an edit. #66354
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reduce When New Rename Is Dismissed #66350
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` project with host outputs API #65831
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify and fix handing of references not yet added #66303
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add a InternalsVisibleTo for Workspaces.MSBuild #66349
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [EnC] Follow up on deleting properties and events etc. #64034
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Added table of content to source-generators.cookbook.md #66317
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Report error referencing method from module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute version #66285
    Area-Compilers
  • Report telemetry event with LSP server capabilities #66334
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, Pending director approval, 17.5
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust closure initialization for primary constructor #66340
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Allow missing document in method debug info (#66183) #66246
    Area-Interactive
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, Pending director approval, 17.5

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected Parent component rerendering #46044
  • [AOT] Clean up AOT warnings in the SPA Proxy project #46036
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, stage1publishaot #46035
  • Design proposal: Localization with multiple assemblies at the same time #46034
  • Incorrect target framework for Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks.EntityFrameworkCore #46030
  • Blazor WASM PWA app published to github pages - PWA not working, errors in console, cannot access .json file #46027
  • Opaque - reference token validation #46026
  • .NET 7 Blocker - Method get_ServerSideSessions in type ApiAuthorizationDbContext from assembly IdentityServer does not have an implementation #46025
  • [API] RequestDelegateFactory.Create RequestDelegate overload #46024
  • `IHostBuilder` does not respect `SuppressStatusMessages` for WebHost #46022
  • HTTP Error 500.31 is rather unhelpful #46021
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, stage1vanilla #46019
  • Question: Does Blazor Identity work inside an iframe? #46017

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add ToHashSetAsync() to IQueryable<T> #30033
  • Method not found: 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelExtensions.FindEntityType(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel, System.Type)'. #30032
  • Migrations didn't create ModelSnapshot #30031
  • SQL output can contain navigation properties as columns - EF Core 7 #30029
  • Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30028
  • InMemory database throwing ArgumentException when using value-converted property in a query #30026
  • Refrain from doing split query when not necessary #30025

Closed

  • Optional columns #30015
  • Using a DateTimeOffset created in a GroupBy fails to convert string to TimeSpan #30001
  • EF Core 7 Scaffold-DbContext pluralizer incorrectly removes .ToTable() in many-to-many relationship #29977
  • DOTNET CORE7+MySQL migrations are failing #29941
  • Reload of Entity won't refresh value of owned type #29939
  • how to change batch delete to update when entity is softdelete #29934
  • Owned value object not materialized after using Linq To SQL Union #29862
  • The QueryTranslationPostprocessor.Process() executed only once when with AsSplitQuery() method #29855
  • Installing dotnet-ef not working on ubuntu 22.04 #29824
  • EF Core transaction retries, ChangeTracker and ConcurrencyCheck weird behavior #29987

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #30037
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.4 #30036
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/7.0] Fix split query over GroupBy over parameter (#30024) #30030

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #30019
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30027
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Correct NRT annotations in SnapshotFactoryFactory #30014
  • Fix split query over GroupBy over parameter #30024
    auto-merge
  • Correct ExpressionPrinter in [DebuggerDisplay] #30021
    auto-merge
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #30017
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #30018

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 1.1.15 #29433
  • Raw SQL queries for unmapped types #29931
  • Scaffolding: Clean up code generation tests #29995
  • Simplify logging by collapsing together sync/async #27668
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
